channel.title: A Cleaner Way to Post Links
channel.description:
Now, I know we're in no way really affiliated with each other, but I'd like to help out Moparisthebest forums by providing this more uniform way to search and post links. This will not require a separate thread for each link and you can still comment on the links.
So, from now on, I'd see it as something for the better if you post your links [url=http://pwnds.info/smf/index.php?action=links]HERE[/url].
Thank you :]
Also, PM me for any ideas on more sections.

item.title: A Cleaner Way to Post Links
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

this is proof

[quote=“moparisthebest”][quote author=ada link=action=profile;u=1723 date=1164011391]

I got this theme from the SimpleMachines website http://themes.simplemachines.org/index.php?lemma=150

I modifyed it a bit (I removed the vB Green logo at the top of the page and readded my SMF shoutbox and Karma button mods).

You’re pretty good at coding, so you should be able to remove the vB Green logo (and replace it with something else :))

Thanks alot

What are you going to do with it (just asking out of curiosity)?
[/quote]

Install it on these forums :)[/quote]

This is the vBgreen theme

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:20, topic:33181”][quote author=usernamelol link=topic=47909.msg603818#msg603818 date=1165822082]
It’s SMF links… We could just get an admin to add it on here instead…

[/quote]Mopar is anti-mod.[/quote]

So? StarBlaster100 is an admin, he could install it. I think he is installing the vReportBoard mod on to the forums.

Anyway, I think mopar is installing a new theme soon (called vB Green), but I’m not 100% sure

item.title: A Cleaner Way to Post Links
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

kmb:

Make it so that you don’t have to register to see that page or this gets unstickied. We already have to many stickies (stickys?) in here :E

Actually, since I have no idea what Guests can see half the time, I had no idea that they couldn’t see it They can now.

“I hope you asked for permission from an administrator, because technically, you are actualy breaking the rules.”
Mopar has already approved my site.

–Unstickied–
Sorry if you thought it was a scheme to get more members. If I wanted more members, I’d probably ask in a more intelligent section.

Read full topic
item.source: A Cleaner Way to Post Links

item.title: A Cleaner Way to Post Links
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

I hope you asked for permission from an administrator, because technically, you are actualy breaking the rules.

I quote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic:

7. We don’t advertise other sites or communities unless we ask and receive permission to and from Moparisthebest. We don’t post links to sites that are not in safe sites list on Moparisthebest.com main page.

Read full topic

Make it so that you don’t have to register to see that page or this gets unstickied. We already have to many stickies (stickys?) in here :E
[/quote]
Way too many stickies ;D Your basically advertising your site to get people to join, unless you make it so we don’t have to register…[/quote]
Exactly.

item.title: A Cleaner Way to Post Links
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Pwnd:

You shouldn’t Maybe post once and see. I know that I set permissions for some things to require you to post once.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 03:21:38 PM[/size][hr]Yeah, there does seem to be a problem with it. Let me fix it.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 03:25:07 PM[/size][hr]Fixed :] Permissions were not set, hah.

There we go, it’s working, thanks Pwnd.
